title: Grateful Dead Live at Richmond Coliseum on 1984-10-06
lineage: Master Cassette > Nakamichi CR7a playback with no dolby> Korg mr2000 (1 bit, 5.6 Mhz). Render from 1 bit to 24 48 wave file using AudioGate.  Pre dolby nr decode eq & software dolby B decode using Nuendo & DDICodec.
taper: Recorded & Transferred by Anon Edited & Mastered (Adobe Audition) by Joe Noel March 31, 2022
source: (FOB) Nakamichi 100 shotguns > Sony TC-D5M > Master Cassette (TDK MA90s, Dolby B On) Location: approx. 40' from stage, mics spaced 4' apart on two Shure s15 stands (up high)
